content.description: The x axis ranges from negative 2 to 6 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 6 to 2 in increments of 1.
content.question: The ellipse intersects its horizontal line of symmetry at (negative 2 comma negative 3) and (6 comma negative 3). The ellipse intersects its vertical line of symmetry at (2 comma negative 5) and (2 comma negative 1). The graph of an ellipse is shown in the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane. Which of the following is an analytical representation for the ellipse?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parentheses x minus 2 close parentheses squared over 4 plus open parentheses y plus 3 close parentheses squared over 16 equals 1"><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses x minus 2 close parentheses squared over 16 plus open parentheses y plus 3 close parentheses squared over 4 equals 1"><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses squared over 4 plus open parentheses y minus 3 close parentheses squared over 16 equals 1"><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses squared over 16 plus open parentheses y minus 3 close parentheses squared over 4 equals 1"><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parentheses x minus 2 close parentheses squared over 16 plus open parentheses y plus 3 close parentheses squared over 4 equals 1"><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
